availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William J. McElmury (Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda Deck McElmury in Livingston County on February 28, 1848. Father of William McElmury, Mary E. McElmury, David McElmury, Andrew McElmury, George McElmury, James McElmury, Harrison McElmury, and Josiah McElmury. Farmer in Livingston County in 1850. Farmer in Livingston County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Livingston County, p. 360A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Livingston County Marriages, Film #000318176, p. 71.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Division No. 2, p. 218.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County,Salem, p. 221A.
